Search Denial Types

Source: R/adjustments.R
search_denials.Rd

Search Denial Types

Usage

search_denials(...)

Arguments

...

These dots are for future extensions and must be empty.

Value

a tibble

Examples

search_denials()
#> $site
#> # A tibble: 64 × 5
